activities: AWP USA Inc. and its subsidiaries may collect and use personal information received from the EU for the purposes of (1) offering, selling, servicing, and/or administering insurance, assistance services, or other products/services to its customers or those of its partners and affiliates; (2) providing information or services for such products to its customers or those of its partners and affiliates; (3) administering products and coordinating benefits for its customers or those of its partners and affiliates, including but not limited to providing travel-related or concierge services, adjudicating claims, conducting quality/satisfaction assessments, or fraud prevention; and (4) purposes to which individuals have otherwise consented.
contacttitle1: Dep. Gen. Counsel; Chief Privacy Officer
corpofftitle1: Dep. Gen. Counsel; Chief Privacy Officer
